name: Maze Hunter (Macapaca5654)
description:
This is my first real project in unreal engine 5, a short game we created for a game jam in around three days.

Your objective is to see how long you can survive in a dark maze slowly filling up with slimes. There is a shotgun hidden somewhere to aid you. How long can you survive the maze?

Programming -

Bruno Reeve

Jack Slaski

3D models and animation -

Kieron Rutter

Nathan Barlow
